attributes.action: Make it illegal to smoke while driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People, while driving, cause danger to other road users and pedestrians, looking for and lighting their cigarettes, dealing with ash and throwing lighted cigarettes out of their windows.  Penalty points should be issued to these people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
